candidates.why: Exact command doc for the requested command; defines modules/files scope, 7-dimension review, hybrid parallel-iterative execution, and review artifacts.
Same review-cycle architecture (7 dimensions + iterations + .review artifacts) but targets session git changes instead of arbitrary file patterns.
Downstream companion that consumes .review findings and produces fix plans/execution; useful for outputs and related-command links.
Single-dimension review flow patterns (review types, execution template) that can be reused for per-dimension agent prompting.
Session creation/discovery patterns used by workflow commands when they need a session context and standardized folder structure.

selected.why: Use the canonical command doc as oracle for gap analysis and as the primary reference for headings/sections and artifact definitions.
